high_descs: Hang a left at the bed and walk to the cardboard box on the floor.
Pick up the box from the floor.
Turn around and walk to the wooden table with the small lamp ahead.
anns.task_desc: Examine a box by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: take two steps, turn left, walk forward to box
pick up the box in front of you
turn around, walk across the room to the lamp
anns.task_desc: examine a box with the lamp

high_descs: Turn left and go forward to the box.
Pick up the box from the floor.
Turn around and go to the opposite side of the room.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the box and turn on the light.
